page.title: 11ANNUAL EVENTS ON ARRAN
page.content: In June there is the{GOAT FELL RACE when locals and competitors from other parts of Britain come to run up GOAT FELL which stands 874 metres high. The first runner home this year set a time of 1hr 20min (the record-1hr 13min).{THE MILK RACE,}a cycle race round the island (approx. 95miles) is well supported too.{THE ANNUAL CATTLE {SHOW}in July is held in Lamlash (5ml. from Brodick). Local farmers take their best livestock hoping to win a prize. Riders with their ponies and horses compete in the showjumping which follows. In Brodick's Ormidale Park are the{HIGHLAND GAMES,}a Sports Day for locals and visitors in August. There are summer displays by the Mountain Rescue Team at Brodick Castle and a{VINTAGE CAR RALLY}which attracts many car owners on the mainland.
